document_title: Klinefelter syndrome: Causes, signs, diagnosis and treatment
subsection_content: Klinefelter syndrome has a frequency of about 1/1000 male newborns. In infancy, the disease will not have specific clinical manifestations, so it is difficult to recognize through external observation. (2)
subsection_data:
hoi chung klinefelter.json. Disease incidence
Klinefelter syndrome has a frequency of about 1/1000 male newborns. In infancy, the disease will not have specific clinical manifestations, so it is difficult to recognize through external observation. (2)
